title: One Piece Episode #498 Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A review of Episode 498 describing it as showing 'the shaping of the young boys' with 'a good bit of fun.' The reviewer notes they continue to enjoy this arc and find 'a charm to all of this that's still working.'

title: Anime Review: One Piece 497-499
author: populationgo
description: A review covering episodes 497-499. Episode 498 was described as 'a pretty standard episode that moved the narrative along, albeit slightly uneventfully' with focus on Naguri's effect on the brothers' lives. The review notes the theme that 'strength doth not a pirate captain make. A pirate captain needs to be able to work together with every member of their crew to achieve their goals.'

title: ASL || One Piece Episode 497, 498 & 499 REACTION + REVIEW
description: A video reaction and review covering episodes 497, 498, and 499, focusing on the ASL (Ace, Sabo, Luffy) brothers' childhood arc.

title: Toei Animation Giving a Filler One Piece Character Conqueror's Haki While Sanji Still Doesn't Have It May Rub Fans the Wrong Way
description: An article discussing the controversy around Naguri, an anime-original filler character from Episode 498, possessing Conqueror's Haki when popular canon characters like Sanji don't have it confirmed. The article explores fan reactions to this decision by Toei Animation.

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc covering episodes 493-516, which includes Episode 498. The review discusses the arc's focus on Luffy's childhood flashback with Ace and Sabo.

title: One Piece Episode 498 on Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming page for One Piece Episode 498 on Crunchyroll, providing legal access to watch the episode with subtitles.

title: Episode 498 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 498 containing detailed information about the episode including plot summary, characters, trivia, and production details.
